attributes.action: make it mandatory for all NEWLY QUALIFIED drivers to have to undergo SOME FORM of motorway tuition with a professional Driving Instructor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make it mandatory for all NEWLY QUALIFIED drivers to have to undergo SOME FORM of motorway tuition with a professional Driving Instructor. 

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Learn-2-live


Her Majesty's Government
